info.name: visualize_labels
info.description: A module for visualizing labeled objects in videos

inputs.name: video_labels_path
inputs.description: A JSON file containing the video labels

inputs.name: objects_path
inputs.description: A JSON file containing the detected objects

parameters.name: add_logo
parameters.description: whether to render a logo on the video

parameters.name: logo
parameters.description: a LogoConfig defining a logo to render on the video. If omitted, the default logo is used
